alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Oklahoma County through 345 PM CDT... At 310 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Oklahoma City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Oklahoma City, southeastern Edmond, Midwest City, Del City, Choctaw, Harrah, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Arcadia, Tinker Air Force Base, Forest Park and Lake Aluma. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 129 and 138. Interstate 40 between mile markers 154 and 158. Interstate 44 between mile markers 128 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
